name: Drifting of a Space Ranger
description:
Drifting of a Space Ranger is a physics based game where each level is procedurally generated as you explore the world.

Help the Space Ranger use their magnet and laser to maneuver through the different asteroid fields to try to find the nearest coveted gas station.

Created by the SnackKrew composed of :

- Alexis Maher

- Maxime Charland

-Samuel Bonneville

The Artwork were made during the jam by :

- Ronan Le Gall (He's incredible, go check him out! )

_______________________________________________________

Controls 

Left Mouse Button : Magnet Beam

Right Mouse Button : Laser

ESC : Close game ( When not in menu )
